PardotTenant.name: PardotTenant
PardotTenant.description: Represents an Account Engagement business unit.

CreationStatus.description: The operational status of the business unit managed by Account Engagement.

DeveloperName.description: Universally unique identifier for this object. If an object does not provide a value for this field on INSERT, a value will be auto-generated for it.

InitialPardotAdminId.description: The Salesforce user who set up the business unit.

Language.description: The language of the business unit.

MasterLabel.description: The name of the Account Engagement business unit. This field syncs with the PardotTenantName field.

PardotTenantId.description: The numerical identifier for the business unit.

PardotTenantName.description: The name of the Account Engagement business unit. This field syncs with the MasterLabel field.

PardotTenantStatusCode.description: The operational status of the business unit.
